name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 5th Birthday Live ＂DESTiNATiON -ちいさな心が行く先-＂【#AZKi生誕ライブ2023】 [e3JBtoh9pOQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: AZKi continues her performance of 'without U' on a multi-screen 3D stage with colorful visual effects.
Scene transition with a black screen and rising instrumental build-up.
AZKi performs 'in this world' on a dark stage with pink and purple spotlights.

subtitles.original: ...明日もわからない
subtitles.english: ...don't even know what tomorrow brings,

subtitles.original: こんな足りないものみたいに
subtitles.english: just like something so incomplete.

subtitles.original: 初めからおしまいまで　きっと小さな私
subtitles.english: From the beginning to the end, my small self

subtitles.original: 世界に怯えている
subtitles.english: is surely afraid of the world.

subtitles.original: だから without U　君がいない時きっと
subtitles.english: So, without U, when you're not here,

subtitles.original: 私は私でいられないんだ
subtitles.english: I surely can't be myself.

subtitles.original: I need U　私を　見ていて聞いて
subtitles.english: I need U, watch me, listen to me,

subtitles.original: そしたらきっと届けられるから
subtitles.english: because then I'll surely be able to reach you.

subtitles.original: 君がいるって
subtitles.english: Because you are here,

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないって
subtitles.english: because I'm not alone.

subtitles.original: 歩き出したのは　私だけじゃなくて
subtitles.english: It wasn't just me who started walking,

subtitles.original: きっとこうしている時でも
subtitles.english: surely even at times like this.

subtitles.original: 君はずっとずっと　頑張っていたんだね
subtitles.english: You've been doing your best all along,

subtitles.original: 私は全部見てるから
subtitles.english: because I've been watching everything.

subtitles.original: 爪先から天辺まで　小さな心全部伝える
subtitles.english: From my toes to the top of my head, I'll convey all of my small heart,

subtitles.original: 想いがここに
subtitles.english: the feelings are right here.

subtitles.original: それは without U　君のそばにいるよ
subtitles.english: That's why without U, I'm by your side,

subtitles.original: どんなに辛く想った時でも
subtitles.english: no matter how painful it feels.

subtitles.original: I with U　聞かせて　君の声
subtitles.english: I with U, let me hear your voice,

subtitles.original: そこに私の声を重ねたら
subtitles.english: if I layer my voice over yours,

subtitles.original: そばにいる
subtitles.english: I'm right by your side.

subtitles.original: もらったものを抱えて
subtitles.english: Holding on to what I've received,

subtitles.original: 少し足りないくらいだよ
subtitles.english: it's almost not enough.

subtitles.original: 一人じゃない　わかってるね
subtitles.english: You're not alone, you know that, right?

subtitles.original: いつまでこうしていられるの
subtitles.english: How long can we stay like this?

subtitles.original: そんなことわからないよ
subtitles.english: I don't know such things,

subtitles.original: わからないから歌うんだよ
subtitles.english: that's why I sing.

subtitles.original: 君といるこの瞬間
subtitles.english: To make this moment with you

subtitles.original: 大切なものにするために
subtitles.english: something truly precious.

subtitles.original: そうだ without U　君がいない時きっと
subtitles.english: That's right, without U, when you weren't here,

subtitles.original: 私は私でいられなかったんだ
subtitles.english: I surely couldn't have been myself.

subtitles.original: I need U　私を　見ていて聞いて
subtitles.english: I need U, watch me, listen to me,

subtitles.original: そしたらきっときっとこれからも
subtitles.english: then surely, surely from now on too.

subtitles.original: だから with U　君の中にいるよ
subtitles.english: So, with U, I'm inside you,

subtitles.original: 君がくれたものその代わりに
subtitles.english: in exchange for what you gave me.

subtitles.original: I with U　どうか覚えていて
subtitles.english: I with U, please remember,

subtitles.original: 私がここに立つ時はいつも
subtitles.english: whenever I stand here...

subtitles.original: 君といるから
subtitles.english: I'm with you,

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: because I'm not alone.

subtitles.original: in this world
subtitles.english: in this world

subtitles.original: 愛が言葉を見失ってる
subtitles.english: Love has lost its words,

subtitles.original: 空が涙を降らせていたんだ
subtitles.english: the sky was making tears fall.

subtitles.original: 誰のために
subtitles.english: For whom,

subtitles.original: 何のために
subtitles.english: for what,

subtitles.original: これが運命だというの
subtitles.english: do you call this fate?

subtitles.original: 嘘が街を包み込んでいる
subtitles.english: Lies are enveloping the town,

subtitles.original: 鳥が飛べずに声を上げていた
subtitles.english: a bird couldn't fly and was raising its voice.

subtitles.original: たったひとつの存在を灯す
subtitles.english: Lighting up but a single existence,

subtitles.original: この場所で君を待ってる
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for you here.

subtitles.original: 世界はとても苦しそうでした
subtitles.english: The world seemed to be in so much pain,

subtitles.original: 私に何ができるというの
subtitles.english: what could I possibly do?
